channel.title: Hacking
channel.description:
ok im talking to these 2 kids on skype, they are claiming to be watching me and my neighborhood.
the other kid says he is going to send me a rat, and in a few minutes my computer will be fucked up... any way this is possible for a 20 year old and a 15 year old.

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:25, topic:439567”]I’z be in your kitchen, searching for open portz with my IPz scannarz.[/quote]while your in there make me a sandwich please

kthx

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:32, topic:439567"][quote author=ytuio9` link=topic=542262.msg3973531#msg3973531 date=1334408445]

Wow that’s some scary shit man. I once had someone who scanned for my IP and he almost hacked my computer. But luckily I had AVIRA ANTIVIRUS SHIELD which combatted his failed hacking attempts at destroying my WINDOWS FIREWALL. LOL what a skid.

You can’t ‘hack’ someone through an ip address. So I’m taking that you have no idea what you’re talking about lol.

Nope man he was hacking me through my IP ADDRESS. It was fucking scary but as I said if you read my post correctly my AVIRA ANTIVIRUS SHIELD was protecting me from his port scan and hacking attempt.
[/quote]
Not possible.[/quote]
you retard he’s trolling you

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:22, topic:439567”][quote author=Lin link=topic=542262.msg3973425#msg3973425 date=1334384832]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=542262.msg3973422#msg3973422 date=1334384536]
and you can easily test out your key

I’m sorry but the metaphor doesn’t work. In fact you can take it pretty literally, an IP can give out your location, and if you know the location you just need the key to get in.
[/quote]From experience, IPs just point to your ISP’s location anyway. Maybe that’s just the case with mine.
[/quote]I didn’t… I wasn’t implying the literal loca…

screw it, op you’re screwed, we’re all screwed, just give them your passwords and RSGP[/quote]
NAOOOOO lol, they started up making random shit, and then i knew, just to fuck with them. So i had a lil fun

edit - you can lock this now.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

There idiots, no point in thread pretty clear they can’t do shit. Block them on skype and change your ip and they can’t do nothing to you. All done.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:24, topic:439567”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=542262.msg3973427#msg3973427 date=1334384899]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=542262.msg3973425#msg3973425 date=1334384832]

and you can easily test out your key

I’m sorry but the metaphor doesn’t work. In fact you can take it pretty literally, an IP can give out your location, and if you know the location you just need the key to get in.
[/quote]From experience, IPs just point to your ISP’s location anyway. Maybe that’s just the case with mine.
[/quote]I didn’t… I wasn’t implying the literal loca…

screw it, op you’re screwed, we’re all screwed, just give them your passwords and RSGP

I wonder if anyone’s ever bullied someone irl for rsgp :|[/quote]

Yes but that’s for another thread and another time.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:11, topic:439567”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=542262.msg3973259#msg3973259 date=1334366894]
they just sent me this screen

[/quote]Hahah, alright this is some funny shit. Don’t worry man, they just took your IP somehow and put it in some shitty port scanning tool to make you afraid. According to that tool, they scanned your IP but could not get a successful ping nor find open ports. The only way for them to hack anyone is by scanning for ports is if you’re infected with a trojan. However, I doubt dumb shits trying to scare people with some stupid ass port scanning tool are able to do anything.

Don’t be afraid and tell them you[/quote]

Could pretty much do this with a simple UDP scanner.

Read full topic
